statements: SELECT * FROM waste_management;
SELECT organization_id, waste_disposal_trend FROM waste_management WHERE landfill_capacity > 1000;
SELECT landfill_capacity, organization_id FROM waste_management WHERE organization_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE landfill_capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT waste_disposal_trend FROM waste_management WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE landfill_capacity > 100 ORDER BY organization_id DESC;
SELECT organization_id, landfill_capacity FROM waste_management WHERE waste_disposal_trend = 'Decreasing' ORDER BY landfill_capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE landfill_capacity >= 50 AND waste_disposal_trend LIKE '%Increasing%' ORDER BY organization_id;
SELECT organization_id, landfill_capacity, waste_disposal_trend FROM waste_management WHERE landfill_capacity < 200 ORDER BY landfill_capacity DESC, organization_id ASC;

SELECT organization_id, landfill_capacity, waste_disposal_trend FROM waste_management WHERE waste_disposal_trend IN ('Increasing', 'Stable') ORDER BY landfill_capacity ASC, organization_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity ORDER BY landfill_name DESC;
SELECT landfill_name, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM landfill_capacity GROUP BY landfill_name;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY landfill_name DESC
SELECT landfill_id, landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity WHERE landfill_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_trends WHERE disposal_amount > 500 ORDER BY disposal_date ASC
SELECT landfill_id, AVG(disposal_amount) AS avg_disposal FROM waste_disposal_trends GROUP BY landfill_id HAVING AVG(disposal_amount) > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT waste_type FROM waste_disposal_trends
SELECT landfill_name, capacity FROM landfill_capacity
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT landfill_name, quantity FROM landfill_capacity, waste_disposal WHERE landfill_capacity.landfill_id = waste_disposal.landfill_id
SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM landfill_capacity
SELECT landfill_name, quantity FROM landfill_capacity, waste_disposal WHERE landfill_capacity.capacity > 1000
SELECT landfill_id, landfill_name FROM landfill_capacity
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT landfill_name, capacity, location FROM landfill_capacity JOIN waste_disposal ON landfill_capacity.landfill_id = waste_disposal.landfill_id
SELECT capacity, disposal_date FROM landfill_capacity JOIN waste_disposal ON landfill_capacity.landfill_id = waste_disposal.landfill_id WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT landfill_name, year, trend_description FROM disposal_trends JOIN landfill_capacity ON disposal_trends.landfill_id = landfill_capacity.landfill_id WHERE year = 2022 ORDER BY trend_id DESC
SELECT * FROM landfill_capacity;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity_in_tons FROM landfill_capacity WHERE capacity_in_tons > 1000;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity_in_tons, location FROM landfill_capacity WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collected_waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT landfill_name, capacity_in_tons FROM landfill_capacity ORDER BY landfill_name ASC
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_trends WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT site_name, landfill_capacity_in_tons FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT collection_date, collected_waste_type FROM waste_collection WHERE collected_amount_in_tons > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC
SELECT landfill_name, capacity_in_tons, location FROM landfill_capacity INNER JOIN waste_disposal_sites ON landfill_capacity.landfill_id = waste_disposal_sites.site_id
SELECT * FROM LandfillSite;
SELECT site_name, location FROM LandfillSite ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT capacity, site_name FROM LandfillSite WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposal WHERE volume < 500 ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM LandfillEmployee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM LandfillSite WHERE capacity > 10000 ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM LandfillSite WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY location, site_name;
SELECT site_name, capacity, ROUND(capacity * 0.75) AS filled_capacity FROM LandfillSite WHERE capacity BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT w.disposal_date, w.waste_type, ws.site_name FROM WasteDisposal w INNER JOIN LandfillSite ws ON w.landfill_id = ws.id WHERE w.waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY w.disposal_date DESC;

SELECT l.employee_name, l.position, l.salary, c.collection_date FROM LandfillEmployee l INNER JOIN WasteCollection c ON l.id = c.landfill_id WHERE l.position = 'Manager' ORDER BY c.collection_date DESC;
